title: Why Can't I purchase blood moon talon
body:
The blood moon talon skin was supposed to be released with the 7.3 patch, but when I go to purchase the skin....it says unavailable???

Help...

replies.body: The patch notes states that the skins are aimed to release during the patch 7.3.  That doesn't necessarily mean release, so it may come later.  I don't have any details on when that is, but bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for news on that.  Hang tight!

It hasn't been released yet. It wasn't set to be released on the same day as the 7.3 patch, but rather it will be released sometime during the patch. In other words, it'll be released sometime between today and the 7.4 patch. :)
